data.description: This Opportunity WSP USA hosts hundreds of internships across the United States to gain hands-on, meaningful work experience to enhance their education and professional aptitude. Our interns gain exposure to real projects while working side by side with senior staff. Through our Developing Professionals Network, interns gain mentorship, networking opportunities and lifelong career connections. Our Transportation Operations National Business Line is seeking a Full-Time Intelligent Transportation Systems Planning Intern to work out of our San Diego, CA offices. The following locations will also be considered: Herndon, VA; Columbus, OH; Detroit, MI. This temporary position is seeking individuals currently enrolled in a Graduate degree program. This internship will be part of the WSP Summer Internship Program. As a summer intern, you have the opportunity to participate in our 12-week program scheduled to start on May 18th, 2026. The individual start date of the internship may be flex...
